snippet: Scientists plan to release details about a mysterious noise, possibly that of the Malaysia Airlines flight’s ocean impact.
abstract: Scientists plan to release detailed information about mysterious noise recorded by two undersea receivers in the Indian Ocean about the time that Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 ceased satellite transmissions and vanished.
lead_paragraph: Scientists plan to release details about a mysterious noise, possibly that of the Malaysia Airlines flight’s ocean impact.

headline.main: Recorded Noise Might Offer Clues to Missing Plane
headline.print_headline: Recorded Noise Might Offer Clues to Missing Plane
